FuncDef: This command configures the FEC policy to determine which routes are imported from the LDP FEC database for the purpose of discovering its paths and probing them.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to five route policy names to filter LDP imported address FECs. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. The specified policy name(s) must already be defined.
